actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to provide for the payment of survivor annuities to widows of certain members of the uniformed services who died before the effective date of the Survivor Benefit Plan.

summary.text: Provides that any individual who on or before September 21, 1972, was a widow of a person who: (1) was entitled at the time of his death to retired or retainer pay because of service in the uniformed services; and (2) had served on active duty in the uniformed services for a period of not less than 20 years, shall be paid an annuity by the Secretary concerned in an amount specified.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the payment of survivor annuities to widows of certain members of the uniformed services who died before the effective date of the Survivor Benefit Plan.
